title: Warlock

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Cast a spell on someone each night. Spells last until the target dies. You can't cast a spell on yourself.
- Instead of casting a spell, you may kill yourself.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When someone who has a spell casted on them dies at night, they will be cleaned. If they are hanged during the day, this has no effect and your spell does not activate.
- If you die during the night, all cleaned targets will be revived.
- If you are hanged during the day, all of your targets' information will be revealed, but they will not be revived.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.

desc:
Post 4446
*The town Mortician was often seen sprinkling an odd serum on the bodies before they died. When the Mortician was finally quartered for suspicious activity, he uttered one last spell before death, and suddenly the dead had returned.*
